item.title: hugo使用
item.description: a 安装 1 scoop.cmd install hugo-extended 主题安装参考：快速上手 | FixIt (lruihao.cn) 安装： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 hugo new site my-blog cd my-blog git init git submodule add https://github.com/hugo-fixit/FixIt.git themes/FixIt echo "theme = 'FixIt'" >> hugo.toml echo "defaultContentLanguage = 'zh-cn'" >> hugo.toml hugo server 配置： 1 echo "theme = 'FixIt'" >> hugo.toml 命令
